description: This Dart source file defines routing logic for a Flutter TV app, including route constants, a router configuration with delegate and parser classes, and several widget screens for navigation.

classes.name: AppRoutes
classes.description: Contains static constants defining route paths used within the app.

classes.name: AppRouterDelegate
classes.description: Manages the navigation stack and reacts to route changes; builds pages based on current path.

classes.name: AppRouteInformationParser
classes.description: Parses RouteInformation into path strings and serializes route paths back into RouteInformation objects.

classes.name: AppNavigator
classes.description: Provides an abstracted navigation helper to transition between routes programmatically.

classes.name: DetailsScreen
classes.description: Placeholder widget for a details view, displaying passed arguments.

methods.name: buildRouter
methods.description: Creates the router configuration, integrating delegate and parser.

methods.name: setNewRoutePath
methods.description: Handles route updates based on incoming route configurations.

methods.name: _setPath
methods.description: Updates internal route path and arguments, then notifies listeners.

methods.name: parseRouteInformation
methods.description: Extracts a route path from RouteInformation.

methods.name: restoreRouteInformation
methods.description: Converts route configuration back into RouteInformation for UI restoration.

methods.name: go
methods.description: Method of AppNavigator to navigate to a specified path with optional arguments.
